lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Richard D. Your spirit and generosity will forever remain in our hearts. The joy you brought to all of us was a gift. To his wife Edwina Sandys we send our love and support. Dr. Steven Rose & Dale Coudert The Coudert Institute Board of Directors, Members & the Staff. 1/3
snippet: KAPLAN--Richard D. Your spirit and generosity will forever remain in our hearts. The joy you brought to all of us was a gift. To his wife Edwina Sandys we send our love and support. Dr. Steven Rose & Dale Coudert The Coudert Institute Board of Directors, Members & the Staff. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAPLAN, RICHARD D
